genericContent.itemName: Sanyo 42" 2D-3D Class LCD 1080p 60Hz Internet Connected HDTV, DP42851
genericContent.shortDescription: The Sanyo 42" LCD TV with integrated digital /analog tuner offers the latest wireless Internet-ready technology. Whether by Ethernet LAN port or internal integral wireless (802.11 b,g,n) reception, if you have a high-speed ISP, this smart Sanyo 42" LCD TV can receive new applications through firmware upgrades.The 2D-3D converter of the Sanyo 42" LCD TV is capable of turning 2D content into a 3D display when viewed through passive polarized stressless 3D glasses (2 pairs included) with the touch of a remote control button. The digital tuner is Clear QAM capable of receiving unscrambled digital cable and over-the-air digital broadcasts. In a high-gloss black finish, the 3D Sanyo 42" television blends into the background when the lights are dimmed in your den or living room.
genericContent.longDescription:
Sanyo 42" 1080p HDTV:
  • 42" Diagonal Full HD 1080p LCD
  • Wide screen 16:9 Aspect Ratio
  • Native Panel Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixels
  • Wide Viewing Angles:178 H x 178 V Degrees
  • Refresh rate 60 Hz
  • Contrast Ratio 4000:1
  • Integrated Digital Clear QAM ATSC + Analog NTSC Tuner
  • 191 Total channels
  • Receives ATSC signal formats (including 480i/p, 720p and 1080i/p) converted to 1080p display
  • 1 LAN Ethernet Port & Integrated 802.11b/g/n Wireless : Vudu, Twitter , Facebook and others capable (with an ISP subscription service)
  • 3D Y/C Digital Comb Filter
  • MTS/SAP Stereo & Digital Audio with Audyssey Dynamic VolumeÂ®
  • Two 6 x 12 cm speakers with 10 w/ch
  • Picture Shapes: 1-7 (w/ remote control PIX Size Key)
  • Picture Modes: Standard, Vivid, Theater, Stadium, Custom (includes H-Size & V-Size)
  • Sound Modes: Standard, Vivid, Theater, Clear Voice, Custom ( includes Bass/Treble, Bass Extension , Equalizer (4 band), Audyssey Dynamic VolumeÂ®, and Lip-Sync
  • XDS-Extended Data Service capability
  • V-Guide Parental Control
  • Trilingual Menus: English, Spanish, French
  • Closed Caption Compliant: NTSC-608, ATSC-708CC
  • Clock On Timer
  • Sleep Timer: 1/2 - 3 hours
  • Auto Shutoff
  • 3 HDMI (High Definition Multimedia Interface) inputs with HDCP ( HDMI 1 DVI compatible)
  • 2 HD Component (Y-Pb-Pr with R/L audio) inputs ( 1 Combo Composite-Component)
  • 1 Composite Input (V,L/R)
  • PC/Mac capable (VGA D-Sub 15 pin) with mini Audio input
  • 1 USB input with Photo Viewer for display of digital photos
  • 1 Coaxial Digital Audio Output
  • 1 Fixed Analog Audio Out (R/L)
  • 1 RF Input ( Analog/Digital Antenna In)
  • Detachable Stand / VESAÂ® 400 x 400 Wall Mountable (with optional kit not supplied)
  • Energy Star qualified
  • Energy-saving "ECO" menu setting (backlight) dimmer and Light Sensor
  • Dimensions w/stand: 40.06"W x 26.44"H x 9.25"D, 33.0 lbs.
  • Design, features, and specifications subject to change without notice
genericContent.shelfDescription:
• 2D-3D convertor is capable of turning ordinary 2D content into 3D display of broadcasts, movies, and games
  • 802.11n wireless, Connect directly to the Internet
  • 16:9 LCD panel with 1920 x 1080(1080p)Full HD 60Hz picture
  • 42" screen is measured diagonally from corner to corner
  • Wide 178-degree vertical and 178-degree horizontal viewing angles (See a clear picture from anywhere in the room)
  • High Brightness 400cd/mÂ² with 6.5ms response time
  • 4000:1 contrast ratio
  • Audyssey Dynamic VolumeÂ® creates theater like sound
  • HDMI Inputs: 3 (Enjoy a superior HD experience with HDMI one-cable convenience)
  • USB Multimedia Input Port
